text: The class FormCharSetFinder is not public visibility as it is the case for the other classes surrounding it. This makes it more difficult to extend JMeter's proxy server with classes in another package as they cannot access FormCharSetFinder.
creator: jens_0@hotmail.com

text:
Created attachment 27521
Fix the issue

Hello,
Little patch to this little enhancement.
Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
sebb@apache.org
text:

Log:
Bug 49976 - FormCharSetFinder visibility is default instead of public.

   jakarta/jmeter/trunk/xdocs/changes.xml

It would be also useful to have the constructor public.
I attach a patch.
Regards
Philippe
